about_the_game:
Embark on an adrenaline-fueled journey into the heart of tactical warfare with our thrilling 5v5 Tactical FPS game. Step into the shoes of a highly skilled military operative and immerse yourself in a hyper-realistic simulation where every decision can mean the difference between victory and defeat.

Prepare to test your reflexes, strategy, and teamwork in intense battles that will push your limits. With the power of One Hit Headshots, precision is paramount as a single well-placed shot can turn the tides of battle. Your aim must be true, your instincts honed, as you strive to outmaneuver and outgun your opponents.

But the battlefield is not just limited to the surface. In this immersive experience, bullet penetration is a game-changer. Use your knowledge of the environment to your advantage, strategically shooting through walls, doors, and obstacles to catch your enemies off guard. Unleash your tactical prowess and watch as your bullets pierce through the barriers that stand in your way.

Aspire to greatness in our rewarding competitive ranked mode. Rise through the ranks, proving your worth as the ultimate military operative. Unlock exclusive rewards and showcase your skills to the world as you climb the leaderboard, leaving your mark on the virtual battlefield.

Immerse yourself in stunning visuals and dynamic environments that transport you to the forefront of combat. With a vast array of customizable weapons, gear, and abilities at your disposal, adapt your loadout to fit your playstyle and dominate the opposition.

Are you ready to experience the rush of tactical warfare like never before? Gather your squad, lock and load, and prepare to enter a world where split-second decisions and precise execution are the keys to victory. Engage in heart-pounding battles, master the art of One Hit Headshots and bullet penetration, and rise to the top in our fiercely competitive ranked mode. The ultimate test of skill and strategy awaits, can you be the world's Last Hope?


(Screenshots posted as of 25/05/2023 are from a very early build of the game and do not represent the final product)

content_descriptors.notes: Acts of Terrorism, gun violence, blood and gore.

detailed_description:
Embark on an adrenaline-fueled journey into the heart of tactical warfare with our thrilling 5v5 Tactical FPS game. Step into the shoes of a highly skilled military operative and immerse yourself in a hyper-realistic simulation where every decision can mean the difference between victory and defeat.

Prepare to test your reflexes, strategy, and teamwork in intense battles that will push your limits. With the power of One Hit Headshots, precision is paramount as a single well-placed shot can turn the tides of battle. Your aim must be true, your instincts honed, as you strive to outmaneuver and outgun your opponents.

But the battlefield is not just limited to the surface. In this immersive experience, bullet penetration is a game-changer. Use your knowledge of the environment to your advantage, strategically shooting through walls, doors, and obstacles to catch your enemies off guard. Unleash your tactical prowess and watch as your bullets pierce through the barriers that stand in your way.

Aspire to greatness in our rewarding competitive ranked mode. Rise through the ranks, proving your worth as the ultimate military operative. Unlock exclusive rewards and showcase your skills to the world as you climb the leaderboard, leaving your mark on the virtual battlefield.

Immerse yourself in stunning visuals and dynamic environments that transport you to the forefront of combat. With a vast array of customizable weapons, gear, and abilities at your disposal, adapt your loadout to fit your playstyle and dominate the opposition.

Are you ready to experience the rush of tactical warfare like never before? Gather your squad, lock and load, and prepare to enter a world where split-second decisions and precise execution are the keys to victory. Engage in heart-pounding battles, master the art of One Hit Headshots and bullet penetration, and rise to the top in our fiercely competitive ranked mode. The ultimate test of skill and strategy awaits, can you be the world's Last Hope?

name: Last Hope

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4690 Or Equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GT 1030 Or Equivalent
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 4700k Or Equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1660 Or Equivalent
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 25 GB available space

short_description: Engage in intense 5v5 Tactical FPS battles as a skilled military operative. With One Hit Headshots and bullet penetration, precision is vital. Rise through ranks in competitive mode for exclusive rewards. Experience the rush of tactical warfare like never before. Can you be the worlds Last Hope?
